original_text: So Aaron did as Moses said, and ran into the midst of the assembly. The plague had already started among the people, but Aaron offered the incense and made atonement for them.
korean_text: 아론이 모세의 명령을 따라 향로를 가지고 회중에게로 달려간즉 백성 중에 염병이 시작되었는지라 이에 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: So Aaron did as Moses said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아론은 모세가 말한 대로 행했고

sentences.original_text: and ran into the midst of the assembly
The plague had already started among the people
